How to setup a cassandra server on windows

1.  Download the Cassandra binaries here
2.  Download and install a java runtime
3.  Open a command prompt
4.  SET JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6
5.  cd \apache-cassandra-0.6.4\bin
6.  cassandra.bat

Posted by Doug Tarr
